(1) DPPH Radical Scavenging Activity. DPPH 24 mg was dissolved in 100 mL methanol; this solution is then diluted to a point to obtain absorbance at 517 nm of about 0.98 ± 0.02 forming a working solution. From this working solution, 3 mL was mixed with 100 μL of Combretin A, Combretin B, or standard solution (1 mg/mL), and absorbance was measured (517 nm for 30 minutes) [ 24]. The control contained 100 μL methanol in place of the plant sample. The percentage of antiradical activity (antioxidant) was determined by the following formula:
